item.title: Can exercise and anti-inflammatories fend off aging? A study aims to find out
item.description: New research is underway to test whether a combination of high-intensity interval training and generic medicines can slow down aging and fend off age-...

item.title: Martin Luther King Jr. had a dream ... about health care
item.description: A doctor from Nigeria tells what Martin Luther King Jr. taught him about health, Justice and inequality.

item.title: As ACA enrollment drops, hopes for Congress to restore funding are fading
item.description: ACA enrollment is down for the first time in 5 years, and people are facing enormous premium hikes. Hopes for Congress to restore funding are fading.

item.title: The near death -- and last-minute reprieve -- of a trial for an HIV vaccine
